## StatsClient.registerSession() method

Registers a session ID in Doofinder.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerSession(params: StatsParams): Promise<Response>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>StatsParams</code> | An options object. See [StatsParams](./doofinder.statsparams.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<Response>`

A promise to be fullfilled with the response or rejected with a `ClientResponseError`<!-- -->.
